title: already exists it does not work when we try to upload a file whose name already exists
body:
### expected behaviour
if i select to upload more than one file, that already exit,  itâ´s detected this fact, so the server offers you different options: replace, cancel, suggest name. if we select already exists, the file should not be uploaded.

### actual behaviour
when i select to upload more than one file, that already exit. although i select already exists, the files are uplaoded.

### steps to reproduce
1. log in the enterprise version
2. create a new folder
3. select to upload more than one file, letâ´s call them, file1, file2, file3 and file4
4. once the upload has finished, select to upload on the same folder the same files
5. itâ´s detected that file1 already exist, so itâ´s offered the menu to choose what we want to do  (replace, cancel, suggest name.). select already exists.
6. the upload seems to be cancelled, however if we refresh the web, the files have been uploaded, so whatâ´s happened is that a name have been suggested. 


### server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.12","versionstring":"5.0.7 enterprise rc1,"edition":"enterprise beta"} 
open suse 12.2 
sql lite

### client configuration
browser: ff, chrome and safari 

operating system:mac 10.8.3

### logs
#### web server error log
```
debug	core	include path for class "oca_firstrunwizard\config" starts with "apps/"	17 de junio de 2013 11:03
